languages.text: "Висирю открылась истина в гадании". {n}Юноша взирает на Монтэга высокомерно и обвинительно.{/n}
"The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Висирю открылась истина в гадании". {n}Юноша взирает на Монтэга высокомерно и обвинительно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Monteg haughtily and accusingly.{/n}

languages.text: «El Visir ha adivinado la verdad». {n}El joven lanza a Einrich una mirada de reproche altivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El Visir ha adivinado la verdad». {n}El joven lanza a Einrich una mirada de reproche altivo.{/n}

languages.text: 「ヴィジールは真実を見抜いた」{n}青年は、昂然と咎めるようにアインリッヒを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィジールは真実を見抜いた」{n}青年は、昂然と咎めるようにアインリッヒを見る。{/n}

languages.text: “宿老已经在预言中看到了真相。”{n}年轻人带着高傲的责难之意，看着艾因里奇。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “宿老已经在预言中看到了真相。”{n}年轻人带着高傲的责难之意，看着艾因里奇。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Wesir hat die Wahrheit vorhergesehen." {n}Der junge Mann blickt Einrich mit hochmütig-vorwurfsvollem Blick an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Wesir hat die Wahrheit vorhergesehen." {n}Der junge Mann blickt Einrich mit hochmütig-vorwurfsvollem Blick an.{/n}

languages.text: « Le vizir a vu la vérité, » {n}répond le jeune homme en adressant un regard hautain et plein de reproches à Einrich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le vizir a vu la vérité, » {n}répond le jeune homme en adressant un regard hautain et plein de reproches à Einrich.{/n}

languages.text: "Vezir hakikati bildirmiştir." {n}Genç adam, Einrich'i mağrurlukla ve sitemli bakışıyla süzüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier has divined the truth." {n}The young man looks at Einrich with haughty reproach.{/n}
